message.content:
cs.CV, cs.GR, cs.MM, cs.IR, cs.AI. 

The paper deals with image segmentation, which is a common topic in computer vision (cs.CV). The use of homogeneity criteria and region growing algorithms also falls under graphics (cs.GR) and multimedia (cs.MM). The paper also mentions experiments on simulated and real images, which suggests the use of image retrieval (cs.IR) and artificial intelligence (cs.AI) techniques.
